oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Written Song Recordings - Tape 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The series of recordings features a variety of tracks written by Harlan Howard. The tracks are performed by a variety of artists including: George Hamilton IV, Kitty Wells, Patsy Cline, Buck Owens, Roy Drusky, Johnny and Jonie Mosby (musical duo), George Jones, Ray Price, Harlan Howard, and Jan Howard. The tracks are from a variety of unidentified dates. The tape is the third in a series of eight.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Three Steps to the Phone (George Hamilton IV) -- (02:29) Heartbreak U.S.A. (Kitty Wells) -- (04:56) I Fall to Pieces (Patsy Cline) -- (07:36) Under the Influences of Love (Buck Owens) -- (09:50) When I Get Thru With You (Patsy Cline) -- (12:19) Second Hand Rose (Second Hand Heart) (Roy Drusky) -- (14:21) Don't Call Me From a Honky Tonk (Johnny and Jonie Mosby) -- (16:43) You Comb Her Hair (George Jones) -- (19:16) You Took Her Off My Hands (Ray Price) -- (22:12) She Called Me Baby (Harlan Howard) -- (24:26) The One You Slip Around With [features feedback] (Jan Howard)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hamilton, George, IV, 1937-; Wells, Kitty; Cline, Patsy, 1932-1963; Owens, Buck, 1929-2006; Drusky, Roy; Johnny and Jonie Mosby; Jones, George, 1931-2013; Price, Ray; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Howard, Harlan; Howard, Jan (Vocalist);
